text: is a Japanese talk show aired every Sunday on Asahi TV. The show is hosted by Bunshi Katsura VI and has run since January 1971. The show involves newlywed couples being interviewed by Katsura and a co-host. The current co-hostess is Mami Yamase. ==Guinness World Record== In July 2015 the show was awarded a Guinness World Record as the longest-running talk show to be hosted by the same person. ==References== Category:1971 Japanese television series debuts Category:Asahi Broadcasting Corporation original programming Category:Japanese variety television shows
title: Shinkon-san Irasshai
